alert.note: Alert for Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Williamsburg County through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingstree, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingstree, Andrews, Trio, Warsaw, Salters, Earle, Morrisville and Williamsburg Regional Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
